ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
The March to RAH #200 Continues! As things heat up in Sierra Gordo, SCARLETT and SNAKE EYES race against the clock to save G.I. JOE's HQ, The Pit, from the sinister grip of COBRA.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | S.L. Gallant (a) & J. Brown (c) | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Sketch Cover | Larry Hama | 2 |
